name: Sharen's Sour Cream Coffee Cake
author: S.M.
instructions: Cream together margarine, 1 cup sugar; add eggs and sour cream. Cream thoroughly. Sift together flour, baking soda, baking powder and salt. Add 1⁄2 of flour mixture to sour cream mixture, stir until smooth. Add remaining flour and 1 teaspoon vanilla, stir until smooth. Pour 1⁄2 batter into greased and floured pan, sprinkle with mixture of 1⁄2 cup sugar, 1 tsp. cinnamon, 1 c. chopped nuts. Pour remaining batter over cinnamon mixture. Bake 30 minutes at 325°. Glaze: Mix together powdered sugar, milk, and 1 teaspoon vanilla. Heat to dissolve and pour over hot cake.
